categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Nemesis was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer of the Imperial Navy.

While assigned to Admiral Wooyou Senn's Task Force Vengeance in the Outer Rim Airam sector, it managed to retrieve the survivors of the Evacuation of Gelgelar, the ship didn't manage to prevent Rebels from escaping. However, Nemesis destroyed one medium transport and heavily damaged a Rebel frigate, the Redemption. Later, the ship was assigned to Battlegroup Orion with another Imperial-class, the Conqueror. Following a Skirmish near Almaran, Battlegroup Orion was lured into a Rebel trap in the Goff system where the Conqueror and Nemesis were destroyed.
